name: Abstract Hip Hop
teaser: Uses much more abstract lyricism than conventional hip hop, typically through metaphors, symbolism, and cryptic meanings.

name: Boom Bap
teaser: Production style identified by a kick drum on the downbeat and a cracking snare on the upbeat.

name: Chopped and Screwed
teaser: Remixing technique involving skipping effects and dropping the tempo.

name: Conscious Hip Hop
teaser: Focuses on social issues and thought-provoking lyrics.

name: Alternative Metal
teaser: Emphasizes melodicism and rhythmic heaviness, branching outside metal conventions.

name: Death Metal
teaser: Features distorted guitars, blast beats, and guttural vocals.

name: Indie Pop
teaser: Combines DIY ethos with melodic, lighthearted songwriting.

name: Synthpop
teaser: Prominent synthesizer sound with reverberated drum patterns.

name: Dubstep
teaser: Half-time beats with heavy sub-basses, emerged in early 2000s London.

name: Trip Hop
teaser: Dreamy atmosphere with Hip Hop-influenced beats and light vocals.
